name: cc-superpowers-sdd
description: Specification-Driven Development with Process Discipline for Claude Code
author: Roland Huss <rhuss@redhat.com>

skills.name: using-superpowers-sdd
skills.description: Entry skill - establishes mandatory workflows for specification-driven development

skills.name: sdd-brainstorm
skills.description: Refine rough ideas into executable specifications through collaborative dialogue

skills.name: sdd-spec
skills.description: Create formal specifications directly from clear requirements

skills.name: sdd-implement
skills.description: Implement features from validated specifications using TDD with spec compliance checking

skills.name: sdd-evolve
skills.description: Reconcile spec/code mismatches with AI-guided evolution and user control

skills.name: sdd-writing-plans
skills.description: Generate implementation plans FROM specifications with full requirement coverage

skills.name: sdd-requesting-code-review
skills.description: Review code against spec compliance with scoring and deviation detection

skills.name: sdd-verification-before-completion
skills.description: Extended verification including tests AND spec compliance validation

skills.name: sdd-reviewing-spec
skills.description: Review specifications for soundness, completeness, and implementability

skills.name: sdd-spec-refactoring
skills.description: Consolidate and improve evolved specs while maintaining feature coverage

skills.name: sdd-spec-kit
skills.description: Wrapper for spec-kit CLI operations with workflow discipline

skills.name: sdd-constitution
skills.description: Create and manage project constitution defining project-wide principles

enabled.description: Enable automatic spec updates for minor changes

threshold.description: Threshold for auto-updates: none (never), minor (trivial changes), moderate (non-breaking changes)

optional.name: spec-kit
optional.description: Enhanced spec management tooling (recommended but not required)

acknowledgements.author: Jesse Vincent
acknowledgements.description: Process discipline and workflow enforcement foundation
